00409 class PVHelper {
00410 private:
00412      static std::map<std::string, eAllPV> sNameToOverAllOrder;
00413      
00415      static std::map<std::string, eAllPV> sDisplayNameToOverAllOrder;
00416      
00417 public:
00418      static const char* pvfName(ePVF pv) { return ::pvfName[pv]; }
00419      static const char* pvfType(ePVF pv) { return ::pvfType[pv]; }
00420      static const char* pvName(ePV pv) { return ::pvName[pv]; }
00421      static const char* pvType(ePV pv) { return ::pvType[pv]; }
00422 
00423      static const char* pdfName(eDerivedF pv) { return ::pdfName[pv]; }
00424      static const char* pdfType(eDerivedF pv) { return ::pdfType[pv]; }
00425      static const char* pdName(eDerived pv) { return ::pdName[pv]; }
00426      static const char* pdType(eDerived pv) { return ::pdType[pv]; }
00427 
00428      static const char* pcfName(ePreCalcF pv) { return ::pcfName[pv]; }
00429      static const char* pcfType(ePreCalcF pv) { return ::pcfType[pv]; }
00430      static const char* pcName(ePreCalc pv) { return ::pcName[pv]; }
00431      static const char* pcType(ePreCalc pv) { return ::pcType[pv]; }
00432 
00433      static const char* modifiablePVName(int pv) { return ::modifiablePVName[pv]; }
00434      static const char* allPVName(eAllPV pv);
00435 
00436      static eAllPV nameToOverAllOrder(const std::string& name);
00437      static eAllPV displayNameToOverAllOrder(const std::string& name);
00438 };
